website_summaries.verdict: A pro-grade set that has more options than many others on the market.
pros: This system gets top marks for heating up quickly and curling well even on thick, very straight, or hard-to-curl hair
Users love the variety of options that offer unlimited styling choices, and the fact that the cord swivels easily when using
cons: A few felt it was a bit difficult to change the rods, and occasionally customers experience barrels not working or breaking

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. When it came to curling irons, I could never get my hair to look good. I ended up with a kink in my hair from the clip on the barrel of the irons. I decided to give a hair wand a try since they do not have the clip, and came across this one. It is so awesome to have the different attachments for the price of what most others cost, and they usually only have one or maybe two different attachments. This one works great, heats up quickly, and made my hair look great!
customer_reviews.author: Cl@!r386

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact you can get different curls with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact you can get different curls with the barrels and it heats up really fast. However, I noticed some features that I did see when I was looking at it on the amazon site and in YouTube videos. There was supposed to be a black little stand for when its hot, basically my stand is attached to the barrels, I noticed that my buttons are blue not black and they are under the heating numbers. It works wonderful but I just noticed those features were different from what I saw and was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Sharita

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of November for Christmas gift for daughter and it stopped working today feb 13, 2018. I would like this replaced it was not cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wand Ever❤️
customer_reviews.text: The best set of hair curlers available on the market today, great value for the money. The number of different barrels means you can create all sorts of different looks and they're very easy to attach and detach, heats up really fast, and the swivel chord makes it really easy to curl hair like professionals do.The storage bag is perfect to keep everything neat and tidy. I am so happy to recieve this awesome curling iron to review. I would recommend this to absolutely everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Karen lockett

customer_reviews.title: Worst iron set ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst iron set ever!!!! First one last almost 2 months, second one last 1 1/2 months. Just stops working. Terrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it,
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Doesn't get as hot as a professional iron though, wouldn't even keep a curl in my sisters hair. But is a nice one to have as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: At least it works(so far)
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and to my surprise the box it came in was showing a completely different wand, I opened it and not only is the wand different but the barrels are different also!! I was going to get this for a friend but I'm glad I didn't. They look cheap and I am highly upset!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yesterday, I went to try to curl my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday, I went to try to curl my hair with this product n I plugged it into 4 different outlets n it didn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Just opened and started using the curling iron wands which ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and started using the curling iron wands which half of them are broken on the piece that fits into the main piece to lock it in. The return period has passed and now I’m stuck with 4 pieces I can’t even use!
customer_reviews.author: Reylido105

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm a licensed stylist. Long cord, heats up quick, love that it's 8 tools in 1. No complaints at all. I bought it for professional use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love this interchangeable wand
customer_reviews.text: Love this interchangeable wand. Been on the hunt for one for awhile but haven't been whiling to drop $200 on one that only comes with 3 barrels. This one is perfect! Works great. easy to use. I get compliments on my curls all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! everyone has been trying out new curls and styles on there hair!
customer_reviews.author: Susan petck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, have tried 2 different wands and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, have tried 2 different wands and so far so good, I'm so in love with this curling wand best purchase I've had ever made
customer_reviews.author: Verenice Santana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best curling wand that I can say lives up to and beyond my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ward

customer_reviews.title: I love this! My hair is hard to curl and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My hair is hard to curl and doesn't like to stay curled. This keeps it curled all day!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Heats up very fast and curls well. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very fast and curls well. I have only used 2 heads so far, but I don't see why the others would be any less efficient. The only downside I found is that I am incapable of correctly placing everything back in the pouch and it won't clasp anymore. But that 's not a defect, it's just me not having patience. If I knew this before buying, I would have still got it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: 8 in 1 - ALL YOU WILL EVER NEED
customer_reviews.text: The price is my favorite part! I hate doing anything to my hair but these makes it easy and fast. I love how I didn't have to buy multiple products for different looks. This has been the best product by far!!! Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine562

customer_reviews.title: Best hair tool ever
customer_reviews.text: Best hair tool ever! I went through 3 similar products and this one allows for versatility as well as offers a safety mechanism with the auto turn off and the manual settings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great and it was awesome to be able to play ...
customer_reviews.text: I only ever use 2-3 of the 8 wand attachments but still this is so worth getting. It works great and it was awesome to be able to play around with the different attachments to see which I liked most
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: We love this Curling Iron
customer_reviews.text: We love this Curling Iron. Won't burn your fingers like others that don't have the no-heat tip. Works very good and leave your hair so beautiful in just minutes
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!  Best Curler I've Ever Seen
customer_reviews.text: Best wand ever! This was my first experience with a "Wand" style as opposed to the traditional curling iron and I am beyond pleased. The performance we've seen has been amazing. Our daughter has hair 3/4 way down her back and when I would try curling, it would be almost straight before we left the house. Not only does the Irresistible Me Sapphire Curler save me time (only took about 10-15 minutes to do her whole head versus 30+ with traditional iron), her curls lasted! Her hair looked fantastic all day long! Definitely a great investment. While the rubber tip does still get pretty hot and I suggest you still use the glove, everything about this set is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: 4649miranda

customer_reviews.title: I recently got this product and its absolutely amazing!! I love that there are so many ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this product and its absolutely amazing!! I love that there are so many barrels to choose from and that it heats up so quickly, so I can get straight into curling my hair. Also the curls stayed for a decent amount of time until I decided to switch up my style. I would recommend this product to anyone! It's would be a great addition to your hair styling tool, and would make a great gift also. And for the quality of the product, and the product itself, the price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing...It came very well packaged , in a very sturdy and beautiful box, all of the heads come in a separate pocket in a very convenient carry case/bag and a very handy glove that helps you to do the work more easy. The barrels are easy to remove and place again. Super versatile, I love the different styles you can get done with this product...Works in every type of hair. Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Pierina

customer_reviews.title: It Replace old curling tools.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product. This is in her words. "I been using this bundle of wands for the past 2 and a half almost 3 weeks. I must say I am in love. The fact that it's travel friendly is a plus. All my old wands had been replaced by this 8 in one curler. It's pretty easy to attach as well as detach each wand. I love how it comes packaged. Each wand has a slot in the holding case. I can achieve spiral curls, too big loose waves. I love the variety. If your looking for curling tools, this is s great choice."
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It does everything!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. While I've only used it for about a week, I've tried four of the different interchangeable barrels and they've all been easy to use and really hold my hair. I also love that Irresistible Me thought of everything and sends you a great heat-proof carrying case, heat-proof glove to help with the curling (that really works well), and a stand so you don't burn your counter tops (been there, done that). Also, the iron only takes 20 seconds to heat up, so it's great for mornings before work. I highly recommend this product as the perfect all-in-one solution for hair curling.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!! and experts too:)
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this curling wand to anyone, including beginners! I love all the different attachments and have had a blast experimenting with fun new hair styles. All the pieces come in a easy to store and travel bag with separate pockets for each attachments and also includes a resting stand to keep you from burning the counter. I plan to purchase this my best friend for Christmas. Heats up fast and provides a lasting curl all day long! LOVE LOVE LOVE the curling iron!
customer_reviews.author: KWill

customer_reviews.title: Best Wand Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wand for many reasons! The barrels create such amazing, different curls! I'm a busy mom so the fact that it heats up in seconds is perfect for a quick hair-do during nap time. Plus it's travel and storage friendly having so many different styles in it's small, organized case. It's a girls dream product!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mills

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tool!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is AMAZING!!! It's super lightweight and heats up fast. The adjustable temperature is a great feature too. I have a bob and I've been able to utilize all 8 barrels. It also comes with a carrying case that is especially handy when traveling. I purchased this wand about 2 months ago and use it almost every day. If you're into creating different looks/curls I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Timperio

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Hair Curler
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! The number of different barrels means you can create all sorts of different looks and they're very easy to attach and detach. And it heats up so quickly! My old curler was beginning to show its age, but I don't believe it ever heated as quickly as this one does. The storage bag is perfect to keep everything neat and orderly and the wand and attachments are all of great quality. At the moment, my favourite barrel is the 32mm one. Perfect for creating loose curls/waves, which is how I like to do my hair on a daily basis. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Love this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron. The wand heats up super fast, the LED light indicator starts out as blue and turns green when the temperature set has been reached. The 8 different barrels are so cool to try if you are really into switching up your hair styles. One minor suggestion I have is to get rid of the tiny 13mm barrel, I don't really see much use for it unless I'm trying to do an 80's perm.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon mom

customer_reviews.title: Bombshell Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have a beauty and style blog so I am always on the lookout for a wand that will be great for me and my readers. This wand is seriously my go to for creating bombshell waves! I love the control that I have with it and how it makes my hair look shiny and healthy after i style it! I use the thickest size barrel and it holds a curl for 3 days (until next shampoo). I get so many compliments on my hair so I had to post this! Check it out on[...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: favorite hair tool:)
customer_reviews.text: Love having so many options for my hair, this is my favorite curling iron, by far. I've never been able to curly hair so well and so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Doucet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and held up to everything it promised. I appreciated the heat settings as well as the auto shut off feature (so I don't burn my dorm down!)
customer_reviews.author: emma walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Heats up fast and produces lasting curls. My favorite attachment is the pearl wand, it gives your hair beach loose waves. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of the wand! Because I have used numerous barrels to create different looks. There's a barrel literally for every occasion !! Great buy. Nicely made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elaine

customer_reviews.title: I love the versatility!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Curling Wand set to use! The 8 barrels allow me to change the type of curl I want to wear as often as I'd like. It is extremely easy to use, and the curls last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 8 barrels. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the 8 in 1 Sapphire! I cannot decide which barrel I love the most. It is so easy to use, and the quality is outstanding! The price is great, very affordable. It is beautiful. I am super happy with this purchase. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Levy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! So easy to use and comes with so many different attachments that I can wear my hair all different ways all the time. Comes with a great carrying case that is heat proof so I can just use the glove to detach the end, put in the case and go. It makes all kind of soft curls that stay in all day long. Would totally order again!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This is such an amazing curling wand that literally gives you any curly hair ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing curling wand that literally gives you any curly hair look that you want! It comes with 8 pieces that give you different looks and i find the wand to really hold the curls well. It also has a digital screen and i find it just makes it look so much nicer. I highly recommend it, because I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbbyleighh

customer_reviews.title: The perfect hair curler!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best set of hair curlers available on the market today, great value for the money. This set came with a huge variety of curling wands, heats up really fast and I especially love the 360degrees swivel cord so my hand doesn't get tangle. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Shireen

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this curlers
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this curlers! It's really an amazing product and good quality kind with having it with 8 different king of curlers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Irresistible Me 8-in-1 Hair Curling Iron Set 8 Interchangeable Ceramic Barrels Multiple Different Tourmaline Heads LCD Curling Wand Best Professional Affordable Curls Hot Curler Heat Protective Glove
feature_bullets: INTERCHANGEABLE CURLING WAND SET - 8 BARRELS with lock system. 32 mm bubble wand curling iron. Each barrel will create a different type of curl: tight perm curls, ringlet curls, spirals curls, ribbon curls, flick curls, large and bouncy curls, beach or wavy curls and finger wave type curls that will hold for ages
NO FRIZZY HAIR: ceramic tourmaline technology with negative ions for smooth, shiny and protected hair. No damaged hair guaranteed!
Fast heating (max 20 seconds), variable temperature control (up to 450F/230C), longevity and protection
Digital LED screen, auto shutdown, 360° swivel cord, Dual Voltage, HEAT-RESISTANT GLOVE & POUCH
We offer a 1 year warranty as well as a 30 days free exchanges & returns in the US
